Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: it definitely helped me feel more confident. Sometimes I check my essays against the rubric and if I'm mising something it lets me know, if I did something well it makes me happy

Question 41.Response: feedback from my teacher makes me feel like there was more effort into correcting it
